name: Vaapas
description:
Vaapas is a simple puzzle platformer game with an unique mechanism to Record your Movements and Travel Back in Time. Use this mechanism in your advantage to complete the levels.

Vaapas was developed in just 1 week for Brackeys game jam 2020.2. Vaapas means return in my native language(Marathi). 

All the sfx used in this game are either royalty free or made at home. the music was developed by a friend of mine Vedang Deshpande.
